vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another spelling of pe.le.shet (פְּלֶ֫שֶׁת "Philistia" H6429)
§ Philistine = "immigrants"
an inhabitant of Philistia; descendants of Mizraim who immigrated from Caphtor (Crete?) to the western seacoast of Canaan
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
非利士人 这个形容詞 種族名稱在希伯來文的意思是 "移居者"
非利士的居民; 麥西的後裔, 麥西從迦婓託遷移到迦南西邊的海岸
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
非利士人 这个形容词 种族名称在希伯来文的意思是 "移居者"
非利士的居民; 麦西的后裔, 麦西从迦婓托迁移到迦南西边的海岸

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.14;
son of: Casluhim (H3695)
§ Philistine = "immigrants"
an inhabitant of Philistia; descendants of Mizraim who immigrated from Caphtor (Crete?) to the western seacoast of Canaan
